model.classes

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.classes.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    CS252 Object-Oriented Programming
    Player Class. Every Player is represented by this class. The player has a hand, a railyard and a OnTheTrack field. He also has a score, and a name.
    Author:
    George Kokiadis csd3962@csd.uoc.gr

      • retrieveTrainCard

        public void retrieveTrainCard()
                       throws CardNotFoundException
        Gets a train card from the deck and places it in the player's hand.
        Pre Conditions : TrainCard pile in deck is not empty
        Post Conditions : Puts a valid card in the player's hand
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - when Deck has no cards to give

      • retrieveDestinationCard

        public void retrieveDestinationCard()
                             throws CardNotFoundException
        Gets a Destination card from the deck and places it in the player's hand.
        Pre Conditions : DestinationCard pile in deck is not empty
        Post Conditions : Puts a valid card in the player's hand
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - when Deck has no cards to give

      • changeBigCityStatus

        public void changeBigCityStatus(int city)
        Changes how many times we have gone to each BigCity, and also handles that if we have gone to a city 3 times, we get the BigCity card if it has not been claimed yet from the Deck.
        Pre Conditions : Player has not already gotten the card
        Post Conditions : Player's BigCityCards status is changed accordingly
        Parameters:
        city - City to be toggled
